item.title: Klipper changes to [bed_mesh] module
item.description: In an upcoming change to Klipper, the default `bed_mesh` configuration will no longer be automatically loaded at startup. If you are using a `bed_mesh` configuration today then it is recommended to add an explicit `BED_MESH_PROFILE LOAD=default` command to your START_PRINT macro (or equivalent print start commands in your slicer). This change to Klipper is planned for February 1st 2023.
